title: Center Element (Flexbox)
description: How to center an element both vertically and horizontally.
code: .center { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; }
author: github.com/chefharun

title: Debounce Function
description: Run input events with a delay to prevent excessive calls.
code: function debounce(fn, delay) { let t; return (...a) => { clearTimeout(t); t = setTimeout(() => fn(...a), delay); }; }
author: github.com/chefharun

title: Using useSelector
description: Get data from Redux store using useSelector hook.
code:
import { useSelector } from 'react-redux';
const value = useSelector(state => state.value);
author: github.com/chefharun
